statements.select: SELECT Id ,[Type] ,[Key] ,Value ,Sort ,Status ,Remark ,ParentId FROM Dictionary WHERE Id=#value#

SELECT a.Id ,a.[Type] ,a.[Key] ,a.Value ,a.Status ,a.Remark ,a.ParentId ,a.Sort ,CAST(b.Sort as varchar)+'-'+CAST(a.Sort as varchar) AS FullSort ,b.[Key] AS ParentName FROM Dictionary a LEFT JOIN Dictionary b ON a.ParentId=b.id ORDER BY b.Sort ASC,a.Sort ASC
SELECT a.Id, a.[Type], a.[ParentId], a.[Key], a.[Value], a.[Sort] FROM Dictionary a WHERE a.ParentId IS NULL OR a.ParentId='0' OR a.[Type] IS NOT NULL ORDER BY a.[Sort] ASC
SELECT [Id], [Type], [ParentId], [Key], [Value], [Sort] FROM Dictionary WHERE ParentId=(SELECT TOP 1 Id FROM Dictionary WHERE ([Type]=1 OR ParentId IS NULL) AND [Key]=#value#) ORDER BY Sort ASC

WITH CTE AS( SELECT [Id], [Type], [ParentId], [Key], [value], [Sort], CAST(CHAR(96+ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY Sort ASC)) AS NVARCHAR) AS RowIndex FROM Dictionary WHERE ParentId=(SELECT TOP 1 Id FROM Dictionary WHERE [Key]=#value#) UNION ALL SELECT a.[Id], a.[Type], a.[ParentId], a.[Key], a.[value], a.[Sort], CAST(cte.RowIndex + LTRIM(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.[Sort] ASC)) AS NVARCHAR) AS RowIndex FROM Dictionary a INNER JOIN cte ON a.ParentId=cte.Id ) SELECT [Id], [Type], [ParentId], [Key], [Value] FROM CTE ORDER BY LTRIM(RowIndex) ASC
statements.insert: IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM Dictionary WHERE Id=#Id#) UPDATE Dictionary SET [Key]=#Key#, Value=#Value#, ParentId=#ParentId#, Sort=#Sort#, Status=#Status#, Remark=#Remark# WHERE Id=#Id# ELSE INSERT INTO Dictionary ( Id ,[Type] ,[Key] ,Value ,ParentId ,Sort ,Status ,Remark ) VALUES ( #Id# ,#Type# ,#Key# ,#Value# ,#ParentId# ,#Sort# ,#Status# ,#Remark# )
statements.select: BEGIN IF EXISTS(SELECT * from Dictionary WHERE ([KEY]=#Category# OR Id IS NULL) AND ([Key]=#Category# AND ParentId=#ParentId#) AND ([Key]=#Key# AND ParentId=#ParentId# AND Id<>#Id#)) SELECT 1 ELSE SELECT 0 END
BEGIN IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM Dictionary WHERE ParentId=#ParentId# AND ([KEY]=#Key# OR Id IS NULL ) AND (ParentId=#ParentId# AND [Key]=#Key# AND Id<>#Id#)) select 1 ELSE select 0 END
statements.update: UPDATE Dictionary SET Status=#Status# WHERE Id=#Id#
statements.delete: BEGIN IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM Dictionary WHERE ParentId=#value#) RAISERROR('不能直接删除父节点！',16,1) ELSE DELETE FROM Dictionary WHERE Id=#value# END;
